member.summary: This class contains extension methods for a more convenient way of making Reflection based dispatch-style calls for the object members.

member.name: M:NppScripts.Utils.NppBitmapToIcon(System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary:
Converts 16x16 bitmap into icon compatible with the Notepad++ toolbar buttons.
Color.Fuchsia is used as a 'transparency' color.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: The custom automation script specific handler for on

member.summary: The default handler for on .

member.summary: Called when automation script is loaded.

member.name: M:NppScripts.NppScript.Run
member.summary:
Called when user triggers the automation script execution.
It is the place for the automation script business logic.
